description:
Soma faces off with one of the underground chefs, Sarge and the theme of the challenge is Christmas cake. Will Soma’s cake and its hidden gimmick be good enough to counter Sarge’s mouthwatering “Cluster Bomb Cake”? Who will be the winner? Meanwhile, Tsukasa’s first battle begins. He is up against Asahi Saiba! The battle of the former first seat of the Totsuki Elite Ten and the leader of the underground chefs begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 交差する刃[クロスナイブズ]
